#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main() 
{
	long long int T,a,b;
	cin>>T;
	for(int i=1;i<=T;i++)
	{
		cin>>a;
		cin>>b;
		long long int mul=a*b;
		long long int gcd,lcm;
		
		if(a>b)
		{
			long long int c=a;
			a=b;
			b=c;
		}
		
		while(b%a!=0)
		{
			long long int r=b%a;
			
			b=a;
			a=r;
			
		}
		
		gcd=a;
		lcm=mul/gcd;
		
		cout<<gcd<<" "<<lcm<<endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
